name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】AZKi SOLO LiVE 2025 ＂Departure＂【ぴあアリーナMM】 [7UlZnyO79Xg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: AZKi performs the song 'Omega' at Pia Arena MM.
Audience cheering and waving lightsticks after the performance of 'Omega'.
Transition video (VTR) showing costume change sequence and symbolic transformation.
AZKi appears in a new costume and begins performing the song 'Departure'.

subtitles.original: ...私は どこにあるのだろう
subtitles.english: ...where could I be?

subtitles.original: 分からない 分からないよ
subtitles.english: I don't know, I just don't know.

subtitles.original: 周りと比べたってさ 虚しくなるだけ
subtitles.english: Even if I compare myself to others, it only makes me feel empty.

subtitles.original: あのノイズが海鳴りのように涙を奪う
subtitles.english: That noise steals my tears like the roar of the sea.

subtitles.original: 切り取った風景を道標にしよう そうだ
subtitles.english: I'll make this captured scenery my guidepost. That's right.

subtitles.original: 傷付いた感情も全て連れて行くから
subtitles.english: Because I'm taking all my wounded emotions with me.

subtitles.original: そっと響くカンパネラ 新しい未来を感じてる
subtitles.english: A softly echoing campanella, I feel a new future.

subtitles.original: 怖くたって進むしかないでしょう 遠くまで
subtitles.english: Even if I'm afraid, I have no choice but to move forward, far away.

subtitles.original: 届けこの祈りよ光となれ
subtitles.english: Reach out, may this prayer become light.

subtitles.original: もっと もっと 少しずつでもいい 私という答えを
subtitles.english: More and more, even if just a little bit, the answer that is me.

subtitles.original: もっと もっと
subtitles.english: More and more.

subtitles.original: 嘘だよ 教えて
subtitles.english: It's a lie, tell me.

subtitles.original: 私の 私は
subtitles.english: My... who am I?

subtitles.original: 輝けるのかな 見つけたい 見つけたいよ
subtitles.english: I wonder if I can shine. I want to find it, I really do.

subtitles.original: 誰かの決めつける輪 苦しくなるだけ
subtitles.english: The circles defined by others only make things painful.

subtitles.original: 眠い目も力に変えるよ 心に誓う
subtitles.english: I'll turn even my sleepy eyes into strength, I swear to my heart.

subtitles.original: 錆び付いた運命の歯車を回そう ほら
subtitles.english: Let's turn the rusted gears of fate. Look.

subtitles.original: 着飾った感情は脱ぎ捨ててるから
subtitles.english: Because I'm throwing away my dressed-up emotions.

subtitles.original: そっと紡ぐフィロソフィ 叶えたい願いを信じてる
subtitles.english: A softly woven philosophy, I believe in the wish I want to come true.

subtitles.original: 胸を張って歌うしかないでしょう 全力で
subtitles.english: I have no choice but to sing with my head held high, with all my might.

subtitles.original: 欠片的な歌に変わる日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day it turns into a song of fragments.

subtitles.original: もっと もっと 嘆きながらでいい 全てが宝物
subtitles.english: More and more, it's okay to grieve, everything is a treasure.

subtitles.original: もっと もっと
subtitles.english: More and more.

subtitles.original: ぴあアリーナ！ 今日は楽しんでいってねー！
subtitles.english: Pia Arena! Please enjoy yourselves today!

subtitles.original: いつも近くこの声を 受け取ってくれたなら
subtitles.english: If you've always received this voice near you...

subtitles.original: この言葉を君に もう大丈夫 ひとりじゃない
subtitles.english: I give these words to you: it's okay now, you're not alone.

subtitles.original: 強い想いを 繋ぐよ
subtitles.english: I'll connect my strong feelings.

subtitles.original: 一歩踏み出してみた 優しく世界は微笑む
subtitles.english: I tried taking a step forward, and the world smiles kindly.

subtitles.original: 高鳴る気持ちに身を任せて さあゆこう
subtitles.english: Surrendering myself to these racing feelings, let's go.

subtitles.original: そっと響くカンパネラ 新しい未来を感じてる
subtitles.english: A softly echoing campanella, I feel a new future.

subtitles.original: 怖くたって進むしかないでしょう 遠くまで
subtitles.english: Even if I'm afraid, I have no choice but to move forward, far away.

subtitles.original: 届けこの祈りよ光となれ
subtitles.english: Reach out, may this prayer become light.

subtitles.original: もっと もっと 少しずつでもいい 私という答えを
subtitles.english: More and more, even if just a little bit, the answer that is me.

subtitles.original: もっと もっと
subtitles.english: More and more.

subtitles.original: この扉の向こう側が 未知の可能性なら
subtitles.english: If what lies beyond this door is unknown possibility...

subtitles.original: 今 動かせるの
subtitles.english: I can move it now.

subtitles.original: 暗闇を手探りで 不安と焦燥の中
subtitles.english: Groping through the darkness, amidst anxiety and frustration...

subtitles.original: こぼれる光を見た
subtitles.english: I saw a spill of light.

subtitles.original: 手を伸ばして
subtitles.english: Reaching out.
